alert.note: Alert for Absaroka, Beartooth Mountains; Beartooth Foothills; Golden Valley; Judith Gap; Musselshell; Northern Carbon; Northern Stillwater; Northern Sweet Grass; Red Lodge Foothills; Southeastern Carbon; Southern Wheatland; Southwestern Yellowstone (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 15 at 1:57PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Stillwater, southeastern Wheatland, western Carbon, western Musselshell, west central Yellowstone, Golden Valley, eastern Sweet Grass and southeastern Park Counties through 230 PM MDT... At 156 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking winds from strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 25 miles southeast of Lewistown to 12 miles south of Ryegate to near Absarokee to 10 miles north of Cooke City. Movement was southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Red Lodge, Columbus, Joliet, Ryegate, Deadmans Basin Reservoir, Cooke City, Absarokee, Broadview, Lavina, Bearcreek, Franklin, Reed Point, Halfbreed Lake Wildlife, Cooney Reservoir State Park, Park City, Washoe, Nye, Luther, Comanche and Mystic Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 700 PM MDT for south central and central Montana.
